response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a special price. Considering its worth to you and the market value, I propose a transaction price of $900,000. This offer aims to provide a fair deal for both parties while ensuring a substantial return for me. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 900000}
